item.title: (Minimalist) Material Design template for Hugo using Amber templates
item.description: Why a static website? When I decided to build this website, I knew I wanted to use a static website generator that I could put anywhere, preferably on Github pages directly. A static website has a number of advantages over dynamic and self-hosted ones: They are blazingly fast They work well for blog-type websites They are more easily secured. Not that I really need it here but that’s always something I’ll take and care about.
